roleset.name: summarize
roleset.note: SUM_UP-V NOTES: The first example has no constituent holding the utterance. If youwish to do use 'A' (as with split utterances), go right ahead. (from sum.01-v)

example.name: not syntactically nice
example.text: As he sums it up: ``We are listening to the market.''

example.name: syntactically nice
example.text: John summed up his relationship with Mary as ``a complete waste of time.''

roleset.name: combine, add, cummulate
roleset.note: SUM-V, SUMMATE-V, SUMMATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on Cryo data.

role.descr: first thing added or all things

example.name: summate-v
example.text: It has of course been a mighty agent in evolution, for those who-1 *-1 can summate all their energies in attack have survived.

example.name: sum-v
example.text: Then I summed their two independent rankings and reranked them.

example.name: summation-n
example.text: The summation of an infinite sequence of values is called a series.
example.arg: of an infinite sequence of values
